import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./AddDrugs.css"; import VerticalMenu from './Components/verticalmenu'; import Header from './Components/Header'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; // Import Bootstrap Icons const DrugsForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ genericName: '', strength: '', medicineType: '', quantity: '', purchasedPrice: '', perMarker: '', vendorName: '', location: '', contactPhone: '', vendorEmail: '', manufacturedDate: '', expireDate: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleClearForm = () => { setFormData({ genericName: '', strength: '', medicineType: '', quantity: '', purchasedPrice: '', perMarker: '', vendorName: '', location: '', contactPhone: '', vendorEmail: '', manufacturedDate: '', expireDate: '', }); }; return (

DRUGS REGISTRATION FORM

Use the form below to enter drug details..!

Drugs Details
Vendor Details
); }; export default DrugsForm;
